body_html: @ezyang Yes, it could be done by using some regex functions in spawn. However, it is hard to keep tracked with upstream, since there's no interface implemented like _compile in Unix Compilers. The patch will probably not work if some new args are passed in.
body_text: @ezyang Yes, it could be done by using some regex functions in spawn. However, it is hard to keep tracked with upstream, since there's no interface implemented like _compile in Unix Compilers. The patch will probably not work if some new args are passed in.
body: @ezyang Yes, it could be done by using some regex functions in `spawn`. However, it is hard to keep tracked with upstream, since there's no interface implemented like `_compile` in Unix Compilers. The patch will probably not work if some new args are passed in.
